body.p: The initial setup costs relate primarily to activities to fulfil the contract but do not transfer goods or services to the customer. The entity accounts for the initial setup costs as follows:

li.p: hardware costs—accounted for in accordance with IAS 16 Property, Plant and Equipment.
software costs—accounted for in accordance with IAS 38 Intangible Assets.

costs of the design, migration and testing of the data centre—assessed in accordance with paragraph 95 of IFRS 15 to determine whether an asset can be recognised for the costs to fulfil the contract. Any resulting asset would be amortised on a systematic basis over the seven-year period (ie the five‑year contract term and two anticipated one‑year renewal periods) that the entity expects to provide services related to the data centre.
